remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to indicate whether the nodes or node-labels of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> are owner-drawn. For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> event.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to customize a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control using its owner-draw capability. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control in the example displays optional node tags alongside the standard node labels. Node tags are specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode.Tag%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control also uses custom colors, including a custom highlight color.
You can customize most of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> colors by setting color properties, but the selection highlight color is not available as a property. Additionally, the default selection highlight rectangle extends only around a node label. Owner drawing must be used to draw the node tags and to draw a customized highlight rectangle large enough to include a node tag.
For the complete example, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.DrawNode?displayProperty=fullName> reference topic.
